channel.title: Mimikatz on Malicious Link
channel.description: Recent content in Mimikatz on Malicious Link

item.title: Kerberoasting - Part 2
item.description: Previous works: There has been a number of different blog posts, presentations and projects that have happened before this post and I will reference a number of them during the post and at the end have a link to all that I know about. If you know of any works on this subject that I am missing please submit a comment below and I’ll will be sure to reference it.

item.title: Using Domain Controller Account Passwords To HashDump Domains
item.description: Since I follow both Carlos Perez and Benjamin Delpy on Twitter, something caught my eye on August 2nd, soon after Benjamin Delpy drops DCSync: @Carlos_Perez haha, if yes, it will be a 0d ;) No, like always it needs some rights ;) DA is cool, maybe DC$ is enough — ü•ù Benjamin Delpy (@gentilkiwi) August 2, 2015 And then later on August 28th, again about the DC$ account (Domain Controller computer account):
